channel.title: Comments on: Opera Shake & Win – Get Free Phone, Airtime or Cash Voucher

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/opera-shake-and-win/#comment-2248">Adam</a>.
Keep shaking, you will be asked to later save progress.
After that, your lost progress will be added alongside the new one.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Adam.

Keep shaking, you will be asked to later save progress.

After that, your lost progress will be added alongside the new one.

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex
item.dc:creator: Hardeywarlex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/opera-shake-and-win/#comment-2233">Mustapha</a>.
Clear your opera cache
item.content:encoded:

Clear your opera cache
